MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD8 and TD9 postcode areas of Jedburgh and Hawick. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.19AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate reports of grounded overhead lines. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9.10AM on 30 January 2021.
